updates: Added back the Armory, along with the rest of the town outside the tavern (there's not much yet)
Added a tutorial about the Armory. It will appear after reaching floor 25 of the Tavern, which is when the Armory is available.
The armory is a second dungeon to adventure in. It gives less mana and equipement than the Tavern Cellar, but is a good source of reinforce coupons. Now you can finally reinforce to the max again!
Fix issue with the tab being inactive too long logging the player out, but not giving any indication that happened. Now it brings you back to the login page.
Fix reinforce chances being calculated incorrectly
Changed login page to work slightly better with password managers
Fix issue with screen readers ignoring the navigation menu on the combat page.
Reworked the entire frontend of the game. Welcome to the new experience!
Removed the player market and the Armory. These will return later.
Capped offline progress at 8 days.
Capped the max reachable cellar floor to 95. This will be removed later when the special floor 100 boss is ready.
Added guest accounts. Make one and have no need to remember a username and password.
Account usernames are now remembered.
You can now pick up profits and return items that aren't selling from the marketplace.
Added player marketplace. You can buy and sell items there.
Profits from sold items can not be acquired yet.
Various backend changes
Armory reinforce coupon drops were reduced
Auto-challenge and mass destroy buttons don't appear until you clear a high enough floor
Added auto-challenge boss, which challenges the boss until you lose. You can close the browser window while challenging
Added a mass destroy equipment button to destroy all broken and damaged equipment
Added a gift system. Players who logged in today got a free gift
Added password changing
Added a new dungeon - the Armory. Explore it to get reinforce coupons and improve your gear
Added passwords and authentication to accounts. If you created an account before this, your password is "password"
When creating an account you can specify a recovery email. Only do this if you *really* care about your account, because while I *think* I have everything secured, I'm making no promises.
DON'T REUSE YOUR PASSWORD! ESPECIALLY DON'T MAKE IT YOUR BANK ACCOUNT PASSWORD.
The site now uses https! Yay security!
Reduced mana gained from defeating bosses
Changed reinforcing to require reinforce coupons. Higher level coupons result in a higher success chance
Equips can now drop reinforced
Destroying a reinforced equipment now also gives a reinforce coupon
Added equipment reinforcing. The higher the reinforce level, the harder it is to reinforce more. Each level boosts equipment stats by 2%
Added new attribute: Attack attribute. Level it as high as you want, gaining +1 attack each level
Combat damage now has slight variation, both dealing and receiving damage.
Added a mana reward for defeating bosses
Added a small amount of starting mana
Added equipping items
Changed database. All previous progress is lost
Slight visual improvement (space on left side
Backend improvements to help performance
